## Goal
Pick one of the following and build it as a new page in `src/app/your-page`.

## Options
Community & Social
- Study Group Finder app
- Club Event Tracker
- Hackathon Project Showcase page
- Mini StackOverflow-style Q&A page
- Real-Time Chat UI (frontend only)
- Top Contributors of the Week widget

Productivity & Tracking
- Habit Tracker app
- Daily Streak counter
- Personal Finance tracker (frontend only)
- Coding Challenge leaderboard
- Public roadmap display page
- Support Ticket dashboard

Components & UI Systems
- Search + Filter UI component
- Reusable Table component with sorting
- Pagination component
- Profile Settings page UI
- Notifications settings panel
- Privacy Settings UI
- Public API Explorer UI
- Markdown Preview editor
- Bug Reporting form UI

Marketplace & Voting Concepts
- Simple Voting system
- Poll creation app
- Micro crowdfunding page

Personal Branding
- Resume Portfolio landing page

## Acceptance Criteria
- Must be responsive
- Uses Tailwind
- Includes mock data
- Looks production-quality

## Demo
- Include screenshots + short video/GIF
